title: Pixel 3 time change messed my phone up (sms not showing, instagram stories missing)
content:
Went from EST to PST and I had to manually change time as the network time wouldn't update. I got back and reset my time -3hours, but then my Instagram stories disappeared. Googling told me it was time zone, so i clicked "use network provided time" but then I noticed when I got a SMS , I coudl read the preview, but they woudln't show up in my text thread. Also shows the preview as stuck to 11:42pm (which is the last text I got before I switched time in my phone)
Even when I deselected network time, I still can't see sent/incoming text messages anymore.
Pixel 3, Android 10
Thanks

*EDIT* I ended up downloading the texts, deleting the thread, and starting fresh. Texts now appear.
